title: Production on Apple's mixed reality headset is rumored to be starting soon
description: The device is apparently going to cost a lot of money and will be aimed at commercial customers first of all.

title: More malware is being hidden in PNG images, so watch out
description: A threat actor known as Worok found hiding malware in PNG files targeting businesses in the Middle East and across Asia

title: Amazon turns crime fighter to foil Chinese counterfeiters
description: Amazon’s Counterfeit Crimes Unit helps local authorities to seize 240,000 illegally branded car and clothing goods.

title: Google Pixel 7a leak promises upgrades for the display, battery and camera
description: Upgrades in key areas could mean that the Pixel 7a is going to be a mid-ranger to be reckoned with next year.

title: Google just made it possible to pay for Spotify Premium outside the Play Store
description: The UCB pilot program allows apps and services to use alternate payment options besides the Play Store.

title: New iPad 2023: what we want to see
description: The new iPad 2023 could be one of the best tablets of next year – if it includes these changes.
